channel.title: *SPOILER*Centre of Spore Galaxy *SPOILER*
channel.description:
[size=20pt]WARNING DO NOT READ ON IF YOU WISH TO DISCOVER THE CENTRE OF THE GALAXY YOURSELF[/size]
Right well this isnt actually a thread just to tell you about the centre of galaxy i wanted to discuss it. A few questions on my part first; When you visit Steve and he gives you his staff is there more to that particular storyline? And why can you not visit Steve when a second time? Do i need to empty my Staff of Life's uses first? Can i recharge that Staff of life? Who else thinks Steve is an actually amazing idea? Along with him being more beleivable than the current religeons. Anyway thats my view what do you lot think?

if you make friends with grox your screen will be spammed with people declaring war on you

item.title: *SPOILER*Centre of Spore Galaxy *SPOILER*
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

sanga282:

Just ignore some of them and head for the galactic core use wormholes to get you there faster. Anyone know where earth is yet?

I tried that but the gork or w/e it is kept attacking, even with the use of wurm holes.

Read full topic

item.title: *SPOILER*Centre of Spore Galaxy *SPOILER*
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

davidude36:

Wow I couldn’t be bothered to get furhter than the start of the space stage. I don’t mind the end being spoiled and that sounds pretty awesome. What does it do?

Terraforms a planet instantly to a T3 score and a perfect habitational ability with all animals and plants included the staff has 42 uses

Niall:

I didn’t read, but bloody hell, how am I suppose to advanced in space stage when to the left of me are enemies always attacking me when I go off to trade spice?

Just ignore some of them and head for the galactic core use wormholes to get you there faster. Anyone know where earth is yet?

Read full topic
